name: Xochicuicatl Marketing Method
description: A compact, exquisite record cabinet built out of sturdy White Chestnut Oak Wood, the likes of which can be found in Xochicuicatl Records. This record cabinet is designed in the shape of a boat, forming a unique triangular space at its top that serves to make the records placed in it better catch the eye of prospective customers. As such, Xochicuicatl Records makes sure to display the records of their VIP singers in this manner to boost sales.
